#include <bits/stdc++.h>


int main()
{
    int term1=1 ,term2=1, term3=1, testCases ;
    scanf("%d",&testCases);
    while(testCases--)
    {
        scanf("%d%d%d",&term1,&term2,&term3);

        if((2*term2)==(term1+term3))
        {
            printf("AP %d",term3 + (term3 - term2));
        }
        else
        {
            printf("GP %d",term3 *(term3/term2));
        }
        printf("\n");

    }

    return 0;

}
